release_notes.en-US: 1.0.9 Remove conversion of html to plain text
1.0.4: Add extra phone fields to contact sync. Update version support. Handle SugarCRM v8 attachment changes.

• 1.0.3: Add ability to specify case macro. Update support to Thunderbird 50. Remove reliance on PHP serialize() when POSTing attachments.
  • 1.0.2: Fixed issue where Thunderbird could hang archiving emails with multiple recipients
  • 1.0.1: Updated handling of custom modules
  • 1.0.0: Change order of select fields to work around issue in Sugar 7.6
  • 0.9.9: Fix bug for non-English locales where menus not present.
  • 0.9.8: Fix issue where settings test failed for https connections.
  • 0.9.7: UI tweaks. Check for message id on server before creating new mail record. Support silent activations.
  • 0.9.6: Add Japanese language strings. Added new app menu items.
  • 0.9.5: Fix notification window on Windows.
  • 0.9.4: Fix bug where create window not populated when creating object from outbound email.
  • 0.9.3: Allow search for account alone on Cases, Opportunities and Tasks. Update support to Thunderbird 15.
  • 0.9.2: Update account related search, custom module search
  • 0.9.1: Update search functions
  • 0.9.0: Initial Release
